job.title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtSelf Financial Incltstronggt helps consumers establish and build credit history We are a venturebacked financial services startup based in Austin TX At Self our mission is to help millions of people build credit and save money on their journey toward financial securityltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtThere are about 100 million people in the US who have low credit scores or who have no access to credit at all Sadly there arent many options for these people Most banks arent doing anything material to change the situation because its not profitable for them to do so Bad credit or no credit history can be barriers to renting an apartment or getting certain jobs let alone buying a car or house And if you can get a loan with a low credit score youre very likely to pay a lot more in interest over the life of that loanltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtOur team is passionate about challenging the status quo of the credit industry by giving people accessible and affordable tools to take control of their credit Executing on our mission requires deep collaboration across our teams to ensure our products reach the people who can most benefit from themltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtWere looking for people who share a passion for our mission and relate to why we do what we do At Self we want to work with people who are driven to tackle challenges bring unique perspectives find solutions and help make the financial space a better place for our consumers We recognize that it takes different people and personalities to make our products  and our company  truly great We only seek the bestltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtIf you are someone who is equally passionate as we are we want to chat with youltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtAbout the RoleltstronggtltpgtltpgtYou will implement a user experience that can be seamless for Android iOS and Web users You will integrate the frontend elements with our Rest APIs and other 3rdparty services You will develop the services and infrastructure needed to provide essential customerfacing solutions at a massive scale You will work with designers product managers and other team members in brainstorming new ideas developing features gathering feedback and iterating thereby providing impactful improvement to our products You will report to an engineering manager and work with our amazing team of professional engineersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt5 years of software engineering experienceltligtltligtBachelors degree in Computer Science or a related technical disciplineltligtltligtFluency in HTML CSS JavaScript and related web technologiesltligtltligtExperience with the development of PythonFlask code in a production environmentltligtltligtExperience building and consuming APIs to work with other services using RESTltligtltligtProficiency with SQL and relational databases such as PostgreSQLltligtltligtExperience in the container orchestration space Docker KubernetesltligtltligtExperience with AWS and cloud architecturesservices is a plusltligtltligtExperience with common software engineering tools such as Git or other VCS JIRA Confluence and similar platformsltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhy SelfampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtThere are approximately 100 million people in the US who have low credit scores or who have no access to credit at all Sadly they have few options Most banks and financial institutions dont make any material effort to address this situation because its not profitable for them to do so Poor credit or a lack of credit history can create major barriers to renting an apartment or getting certain jobs let alone buying a car or house Even if you can get a loan with a low credit score youre very likely to pay much more in interest and fees over the life of that loanltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtSelf Financial Inc is a venturebacked financial services startup based in Austin TX Our mission is to address this inequity by helping millions of traditionallyunderserved people build credit and save money on their journey toward financial securityltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtIn addition to our positive mission we also foster an open welcoming and fun culture and take pride in being one of Austins best places to workltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtBenefits and PerksltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe have the compensation and benefits you expect But theres one thing that Self Financial can offer that many startups cannot we can positively change the world while making a profit Over 64 million adults in the US do not have a credit score because of a lack of credit history Self is solving this problem with creative technology solutions and partnershipsltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtOur perks includeltpgtltulgtltligtCompetitive PayltligtltligtBonus ProgramltligtltligtStock OptionsltligtltligtSelf pays 100 of employees monthly medical dental and vision benefit costs and a portion of dependent insurance coverageltligtltligtBuy up options available costs vary across benefit typeltligtltligt401k Plan available to fulltime employees to save for retirementltligtltligtSelf pays 100 of LifeADampampDShortTerm and LongTerm Disability insurance premium costs for all fulltime employeesltligtltligtEnjoy our flexible vacation policyltligtltligtCompany paid education and training programsltligtltligtFree athome workout through Sworkit and gym membershipltligtltligtPlenty of snacks and drinks provided at the officeltligtltligtCasual dress codeltligtltligtTeam building happy hours and events Online now due to pandemicltligtltligtDowntown Austin office space Our offices are partially openltligtltligtRemote work arrangements due to the pandemicltligtltligtMonthly 100 COVID stipend for full time employees through 122021ltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtHow we act with each other is how we act with our customers We are direct transparent and respectful and we hope you embrace that approachltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtSelf Financial requires all employees hired to successfully pass a background checkltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe are an Equal Opportunity Employerltpgt
